mapper.insert: insert into product values((select nvl(max(pnum),0)+1 from product),1,sysdate,#{as_info},TO_DATE(#{p_cdate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'),#{pname},#{detail},#{stock},#{p_category},#{p_video},#{p_sangse},#{option1},#{select_op1},#{option2},#{select_op2},#{option3},#{select_op3},0,0,#{p_price},null,#{p_sprice},#{auction},#{beuid})
mapper.select: select p_video, p_date from (select rownum r,p_video,p_date from product) where r <= 5 order by p_date
select * from (select rownum r, pnum, p_date, p_cdate, p_sangse, pname, hits, p_price, beuid, auction from (select * from product where p_cdate <= sysdate order by p_cdate desc)) where r <= 5
